TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 管理 SQL Server 数据库中 ASP.NET 应用程序的成员资格信息存储。

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类和类提供成员资格服务使用 SQL Server 数据库的 ASP.NET 应用程序。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 不能使用不带 SQL Server。You cannot use a without SQL Server. 您的计算机具有安装默认实例名称与 SQL Server Express 和启用，用户实例时对象将创建一个数据库，称为`aspnetdb`在应用程序的`App_Data`directory 第一次应用程序运行时。When your computer has SQL Server Express installed with the default instance name and user-instancing enabled, the object will create a database called `aspnetdb` in the application's `App_Data` directory the first time the application is run. 若要手动创建数据库，运行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`中找到可执行文件`%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber`文件夹，并指定`-A m`选项 (例如`aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`)。To manually create the database, run the `Aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the `%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber` folder and specify the `-A m` option (for example `aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`). 创建的数据库称为 Aspnetdb。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者，运行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`GUI 配置模式中请求并选择要配置所有 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run `Aspnet_regsql.exe` to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET Features. 如果使用集成的安全性的连接字符串配置成员资格提供程序，ASP.NET 应用程序的进程帐户必须有权连接到 SQL Server 数据库。If the membership provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. 在 Machine.config 文件定义一个默认值实例名为`AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`： 连接到本地计算机上的默认 SQL Server Express 实例。The Machine.config file defines a default instance named `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider` that connects to the default SQL Server Express instance on the local machine. 如果您安装了 SQL Server Express 使用默认实例名称，或 ASP.NET 应用程序，可以在 Web.config 文件中定义你自己的实例，可以使用提供程序的此实例。You can use this instance of the provider if you installed SQL Server Express with the default instance name, or you can define your own instance in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果您设置`passwordCompatMode`属性为、 应用程序可以使用哈希算法和加密的成员身份选项，ASP.NET 4 中增加了。If you set the `passwordCompatMode` attribute to , the application can use the hashing and encryption membership options that were added in ASP.NET 4. 但是，如果`passwordCompatMode`属性设置为、 仅哈希和加密的成员身份选项从 ASP.NET 2.0 中，ASP.NET 3.5 中，并可以在 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1。However, if the `passwordCompatMode` attribute is set to , only the hashing and encryption membership options from the ASP.NET 2.0, ASP.NET 3.5, and ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 can be used. 默认值为 。The default value is . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置为使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` remarks.format: ## Remarks 由对用户信息进行分组。The is used by the to group user information. 通过符合条件的用户信息与应用程序名称，可以在单个数据库中存储多个应用程序的信息，而无需重复的用户名称之间发生冲突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 此外，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的用户数据库属性。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性或者可以使用 Web 应用程序配置文件中以声明方式设置`applicationName`属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application with the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`Web 应用程序，在配置文件中的属性则使用对应用程序所做的第一个请求的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因为一个默认成员资格提供程序实例用于所有服务的请求对象，可以有多个请求同时执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default membership provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写入操作，且不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 我们建议你避免编写代码来允许用户设置属性除非必要，否则。We recommend that you avoid writing code to allow users to set the property unless you must. 应用程序的示例情况属性可能需要是管理应用程序，用于管理多个应用程序的成员身份数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages membership data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应在单用户应用程序并不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 指定应用程序的实例并设置到`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的用户对密码进行更新。This method is called by the class to update the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 最大密码长度为 128 个字符。The maximum password length is 128 characters. 如果不正确密码提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码尝试次数就会递增 1。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户被锁定而无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码，用户当前未被锁定，则内部计数器跟踪无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试将重置为零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以调用方法首先获取对引用由直接实例通过属性的类。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 属性公开`defaultProvider`应用程序的 Web.config 文件中指定。The property exposes the `defaultProvider` specified in the Web.config file for the application. 配置提供程序不是默认的提供程序使用引用属性。Configured providers that are not the default provider referenced using the property. 此外可以通过更改用户密码方法。You can also change user passwords by using the method. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例修改为指定的用户的密码。The following code example modifies the password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 此示例使用的属性类来调用指定为`defaultProvider`Web.config 文件中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果需要访问作为类型的默认提供程序，可以强制转换属性的类。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要访问其他配置提供程序为特定的提供程序类型，你可以通过其配置名称和访问它们属性的类，并应将它们转换为特定的提供程序类型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类，以更新密码提示问题和答案 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的用户。This method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the SQL Server database that is specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 使用中指定的格式加密密码提示问题答案属性。The password answer is encrypted using the format that is specified in the property. 要求密码提示问题和答案可提供额外的安全时检索或重置用户的密码。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 在创建时的用户名称，用户可以提供的问题和答案，以后可用于检索或重置忘记的密码。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 方法更新密码提示问题和答案成员资格用户。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user. 如果不正确密码提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码尝试次数就会递增 1。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counters that track invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户被锁定而无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by calling the method. 如果提供正确的密码，用户当前未被锁定，则内部计数器跟踪无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试将重置为零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 密码提示问题的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密码提示问题答案的最大长度为 128 个字符。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 有关更多信息，请参见、和。For more information, see , , and . 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例更新密码提示问题和答案的用户。The following code example updates the password question and answer for a user. > [!NOTE] > 此示例使用的属性类来调用指定为`defaultProvider`Web.config 文件中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果需要访问作为类型的默认提供程序，可以强制转换属性的类。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要访问其他配置提供程序为特定的提供程序类型，你可以通过其配置名称和访问它们属性的类，并应将它们转换为特定的提供程序类型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类，以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中创建一个新用户。This method is called by the class to create a new user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file. 新的用户标识与已配置。New users are identified with the configured . 如果属性设置为`true`，并`null`或空字符串 ("") 为指定`email`参数，用户创建将失败。If the property is set to `true`, and `null` or an empty string ("") is specified for the `email` parameter, the user creation will fail. 创建用户也将失败，如果属性设置为`true`的值指定为`email`参数与已配置的数据库中的现有用户的电子邮件地址重复。The user creation will also fail if the property is set to `true` and the value specified for the `email` parameter is a duplicate of the email address for an existing user in the database for the configured . 用户名称的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the user name is 256 characters. 电子邮件地址的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the email address is 256 characters. 密码以明文形式或哈希或加密后的最大长度为 128 个字符。The maximum length for the password in clear text or after it has been hashed or encrypted is 128 characters. 其他会导致用户创建失败的条件：Other conditions that will cause user creation to fail: - `password`参数是`null`，或修整后变成空字符串。The `password` parameter is `null`, or an empty string after trimming. - 长度`password`参数是中指定的值小于属性。The length of the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - 中非字母字符数`password`参数是中指定的值小于属性。The number of non-alphabetic characters in the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - `password`参数将正则表达式中的不传递属性。The `password` parameter does not pass the regular expression in the property. - `passwordAnswer` 参数是空字符串。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is an empty string. - `passwordAnswer`参数的长度超过 128 个字符。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is longer than 128 characters. - 属性是`true`和密码提示问题是`null`或修整后变成空字符串。The property is `true` and the password question is either `null` or an empty string after trimming. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中检索用户信息。This method is called by the class to retrieve user information from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中，零标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的成员资格用户的总数`applicationName`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users for the configured `applicationName`. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1，`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含 6 到返回的第十个用户。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回用户的列表中的数据页的用户数的计数与当前已联机。The following code example returns a list of users in pages of data with a count of the number of users currently online. > [!NOTE] > 此示例使用类来调用指定为`defaultProvider`Web.config 文件中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果需要访问作为类型的默认提供程序，可以强制转换属性的类。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要访问其他配置提供程序为特定的提供程序类型，你可以通过其配置名称和访问它们属性的类，并应将它们转换为特定的提供程序类型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中检索用户的密码。This method is called by the class to retrieve the password for a user from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 如果不正确的密码答案提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试就会递增 1。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户被锁定而无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码答案，并且用户当前未被锁定，则跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试的内部计数器重置为零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以调用方法首先获取对引用由直接实例通过属性的类。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 如果属性设置为，则方法不能检索密码。If the property is set to , the method cannot retrieve the password. 哈希的密码进行单向加密，并且不能解密。Hashed passwords are encrypted one-way and cannot be decrypted. 如果属性设置为，并设置为`true`、初始化提供程序时引发。If the property is set to , and is set to `true`, a is thrown when the provider is initialized. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索指定的用户名的密码，并将其发送到电子邮件中的用户。The following code example retrieves the password for a specified user name and sends it to the user in an email message. > [!NOTE] > 需要高级别的安全性的站点，不建议使用电子邮件以明文返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高度安全的站点，我们建议返回密码使用加密，例如 SSL。For high-security sites, we recommend that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!NOTE] > 此示例会调用指定为`defaultProvider`通过使用 Web.config 文件中类。This sample calls the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file by using the class. 如果需要访问作为类型的默认提供程序，可以强制转换属性的类。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要访问其他配置提供程序为特定的提供程序类型，你可以通过其配置名称和访问它们属性的类，并应将它们转换为特定的提供程序类型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 结合工作来防止不需要猜测密码或通过重复尝试的成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案的源。The works in conjunction with the to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果无效密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户的数目大于或等于的值属性的值指定的分钟数内属性，则成员资格用户通过设置锁定属性设置为`true`直到用户解锁与方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the property within the number of minutes identified by the value of the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked with the method. 如果之前提供一个有效的密码达到值时，跟踪无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数器将重置为零。If a valid password is supplied before the value is reached, the counters that track the number of invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如果之前提供一个有效的密码答案达到值时，仅跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数器重置为零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the value is reached, only the counter that tracks the number of invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 单独保留无效密码尝试次数和无效密码提示问题答案尝试计数。The keeps counts of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 无效密码尝试结果中仅密码尝试计数器递增。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 无效密码提示问题答案尝试仅密码提示问题答案计数器递增。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 在该应用程序配置中设置属性值`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`配置节的属性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration section. 如果属性设置为`false`，不跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例，并设置`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`属性为五个的无效尝试和`passwordAttemptWindow`为 30 分钟。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的工作原理与结合属性以帮助防止不需要的源猜测密码或密码答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or the password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 当用户尝试登录、 更改其密码或重置其密码时，在指定的时间范围内只允许一定数量的连续尝试次数。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 通过指定的时间窗口长度属性，用于标识的无效尝试之间所允许的分钟数。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果向用户发出的连续失败尝试次数重置他或她的密码与存储中的值相等属性，以及时间后经过的最后一次的无效尝试是否为指定的分钟数小于属性，则成员资格用户被锁定通过设置属性设置为`true`。If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true`. 用户可以通过调用解锁方法。The user can be unlocked by calling the method. 如果当前失败的尝试和上次失败的尝试之间的间隔大于属性设置，则当前的无效尝试计为第一个。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first. 如果达到允许的无效尝试的最大数目之前提供有效密码提示问题答案，则无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数设置为零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果允许无效的最大数目之前提供一个有效的密码尝试次数达到，无效密码尝试次数和无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数设置为零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 单独保留的无效密码尝试次数和无效密码提示问题答案尝试计数。The keeps count of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 无效密码尝试结果中仅密码尝试计数器递增。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 无效密码提示问题答案尝试仅密码提示问题答案计数器递增。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 在该应用程序配置中设置属性值`passwordAttemptWindow`配置节的属性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration section. 如果属性设置为`false`，不跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例，并设置`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`属性为五个的无效尝试和`passwordAttemptWindow`为 30 分钟。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取一个值，表示用于在 SQL Server 成员资格数据库中存储密码的格式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server membership database.

value.span: 一个 值，表示用于在 SQL Server 数据库中存储密码的格式。

span.span: One of the values, indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Hashed`仅`Clear`和`Encrypted`是不安全的。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 使用单向哈希算法和随机生成的 salt 值存储在数据库中时，将会经过密码哈希。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 密码验证时，它是哈希处理用于验证数据库中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 无法检索哈希的密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密码不被视为安全，受到破坏，可以显示出您的数据库的内容也可以公开加密密钥。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 这意味着无法解密已加密的密码，并将其公开。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分中指定值。The value is specified in the section of the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. `Encrypted` 和`Hashed`密码加密或哈希处理的默认值基于在配置中的元素中提供的信息。`Encrypted` and `Hashed` passwords are encrypted or hashed by default based on information supplied in the element in your configuration. 请注意，如果指定的值`3DES`有关`validation`属性，或如果未不指定任何值，哈希的密码将进行哈希处理使用算法。Note that if you specify a value of `3DES` for the `validation` attribute, or if no value is specified, hashed passwords will be hashed using the algorithm. 可以使用定义的自定义哈希算法`hashAlgorithmType`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。A custom hash algorithm can be defined using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 如果选择加密，默认密码加密使用 AES。If you choose encryption, default password encryption uses AES. 您可以通过设置更改加密算法`decryption`配置元素的属性。You can change the encryption algorithm by setting the `decryption` attribute of the configuration element. 如果您正在加密密码，必须提供一个显式值`decryptionKey`元素中的属性。If you are encrypting passwords, you must provide an explicit value for the `decryptionKey` attribute in the element. 默认值`AutoGenerate`为`decryptionKey`使用加密密码与 ASP.NET 成员资格时，不支持属性。The default value of `AutoGenerate` for the `decryptionKey` attribute is not supported when using encrypted passwords with ASP.NET Membership. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 指定应用程序的实例，并将其密码的格式设置为`Hashed`。It specifies the application's instance and sets its password format to `Hashed`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于评估密码复杂性的正则表达式对象。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 属性设置在应用程序配置中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`部分中的应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类提供成员资格服务和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性验证的密码符合以下条件的正则表达式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 为至少为 7 个字符。Is at least seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不满足这些条件，成员资格提供程序不接受此密码。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类，以重置到一个新的 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的用户的密码随机生成的值。This method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config) to a new, randomly generated value. 返回新的密码。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 通过创建随机密码方法不能保证传递中的正则表达式属性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机的密码将符合确立的条件和属性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 方法是最常用的何时属性设置为`Hashed`。The method is most commonly used when the property is set to `Hashed`. 如果用户忘记了密码进行哈希处理，不能检索密码。If a user forgets a password that is hashed, the password cannot be retrieved. 但是，该提供程序可以重置密码为新的自动生成密码如果用户提供正确的密码提示问题答案。However, the provider can reset the password to a new, automatically generated password if the user supplies the correct password answer. 如果不正确的密码答案提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码尝试次数就会递增 1。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户被锁定而无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码答案，并且用户当前未被锁定，则跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试的内部计数器重置为零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以调用方法首先获取对引用由直接实例与属性的类。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from the of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 密码不能保证传递正则表达式中包含属性，如果已指定。The password is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression contained in the property, if one is specified. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类，以验证在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中用户的用户信息。This method is called by the class to validate user information for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 当用户成功通过验证时，为当前日期和时间在数据库中的更新的上次活动日期和上次登录日期值。When a user is successfully validated, the last activity date and last sign-in date values are updated to the current date and time in the database. 如果不正确密码提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码尝试次数就会递增 1。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户被锁定而无法登录，直到通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码，用户当前未被锁定，则内部计数器跟踪无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试将重置为零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ##
